help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Answers to your questions
help.description: Do you have a question, suggestion, or specific issue?
help.faq1Question: How do I change my password?
help.faq1Answer: To change your password, go to account settings and click on 'Change password'. Enter your current password and the new password you want to set.
help.faq2Question: How do I delete my account?
help.faq2Answer: To delete your account, go to account settings and click on 'Delete account'. Please note that this action is irreversible and will delete all your data.
help.faq3Question: Was this app created by IMT students?
help.faq3Answer: Yes, this app was developed by IMT students as part of a project to improve the student experience on campus. We are constantly working on adding new features and improving the app based on your feedback.
help.faq4Answer: If you would like to contribute to the development of this app, you can join our team by contacting us on our WhatsApp group. Any help is welcome, whether it's development, design, or testing.

legal.title: Legal
legal.subtitle: Terms of use and privacy policy
legal.termsDescription: Please read these terms of use carefully before using our app.
legal.acceptanceText: By using this app, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the app.
legal.userAccountText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
legal.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
legal.liabilityText: This app is provided 'as is' without any warranty. We are not responsible for damages resulting from the use of this app.
legal.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after they are published in the app.
legal.privacyPolicyDescription: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for help.
legal.dataUsageText: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.
legal.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.
legal.contactText: If you have questions about these terms or our privacy policy, please contact us via our WhatsApp group in the Help section.
